meanings.definition: The quality of being adorable or lovable.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's adorableness melted everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent3: The adorableness of the baby's laughter was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The adorableness of the kitten was like a ray of sunshine in the room.
meanings.sent5: I couldn't resist the adorableness of the little ducklings following their mother.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being charming or delightful.
meanings.sent1: The adorableness of the child's innocence was endearing.
meanings.sent2: The adorableness of the flowers in the garden brought joy to all.
meanings.sent3: The adorableness of the clumsy puppy trying to catch its tail was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The adorableness of the old couple holding hands was a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The adorableness of the little girl's giggle filled the room with happiness.
